entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet sln add` not consistently discovering Project Type Guids for unknown project types #47638
  • Discuss the handling of `RunSettingsFilePath` in new dotnet test experience #47636
    10.0.1xx
  • Revise `TryGetProjectOrSolutionFilePath` and `GetSolutionFilePaths` logic for the new dotnet test experience #47635
    10.0.1xx
  • The ToString() method of the StringBuilder class is used in conjunction with $ #47633

Closed

  • [MSTest template] Test runner wording should be VSTest/Microsoft.Testing.Platform rather than VSTest/MSTest #47090
  • [MSTest template] aka link for test runner doesn't seem to be correct #47092

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47634
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: Move command folder sources #47620
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • Add validation for command-line arguments related to new dotnet test #47616
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't get produced packages from transitive references in other build passes #47610
    Area-VMR
  • dotnet CLI: Removed .Designer files #47617
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Updated

  • Remove primary vertical concept from JoinVerticals #47338
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Add command 'dotnet project add' #47500
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Update `dotnet run file.cs` spec with new ignored directives syntax #47543
    untriaged, Area-run-file
